short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautifully replace new tab screen with simple and minimalist winter themed background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free & open source new tab replacement for your browser. All images are taken from Unsplash. Image background will be automatically changed every 5 minutes, or you can change it manually.
